name: If only I could go home early
name_original: If only I could go home early
description:
This is a Point & Click game about an interesting wife.
This is a level-based game about a love story.
This is a pixel-art game about a man's dream and pessimism to life.

Game Story

You are an office worker and always work late.
One day when you came home from working overtime, you found your wife dead on the ground.
Don't worry, she's just pretending to be dead, and this isn't the first time.
Try to find the right way make her up. After all, the floor is cold and you love her.

Gameplay

Solve the puzzles according to the prompt of the wife's "corpse".
publishers: Hainan Miwan Interaction Information Technology Co
